lead_paragraph: America must stop blocking U.N. action on Mideast peace and start pushing for a tough Security Council resolution that forces both parties to negotiate a deal — and fast.

headline.main: Give Up on Netanyahu, Go to the United Nations
headline.print_headline: Obama's Slim Chance for Mideast Peace

snippet: America must stop blocking U.N. action on Mideast peace and start pushing for a tough Security Council resolution that forces both parties to negotiate a deal — and fast.
